Description:
IMMACULATE HOME IN A DESIRABLE LOCATION
This wonderful home set on approx 588m2 features a light & bright north facing front lounge flowing through to an open plan living, dining and modern kitchen at the rear with a superb elevated deck overlooking a lovely landscaped garden. Comprising four comfortable bedrooms including Master with WIR & ensuite, ducted heating and reverse cycle split system for year round comfort. Outside enjoys a fantastic double carport & garage at the end of an extended driveway which will comfortably accommodate cars, boats or caravans! Ideally situated in the seaside town of Clifton Springs, this immaculate home has been lovingly maintained and is ideally suited for families or those looking to retire allowing you to enjoy the spectacular lifestyle on offer here on the Bellarine Peninsula!

Description:
Exciting Appeal for Families/First Home Buyers/Investors/Developers
Offering effortless family living and entertaining this beautifully maintained family home has all the amenities for the first home buyer, investor or developer. With modern renovations to the kitchen and bathroom, fresh paintwork and new carpets this property is ready to move straight into. Set on an extra large easement free corner allotment of approximately 810sqm, this property would also be perfect for re-development (STCA). For those seeking convenience the home is located within a short walk to Leopold Primary School, the Community Centre, transport and the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre.
Welcoming wide covered verandah, exterior window awnings
Generous light filled open plan living/dining/kitchen
Living room has gas log fire, split system & ceiling fan
Seamless flow from living to large covered entertainers deck
Kitchen with dishwasher, sliding window/servery to deck
Three bedrooms plus study or 4th bedroom, all with BIRs
Split system to master, ceiling fan to 2nd bedroom
Modern bathroom has separate bath & good size shower
Large laundry with storage cupboards, separate w/c
Double garage, workbench area, large rear & side yard
Under deck storage area, Side yard perfect for caravan/boat storage

Description:
Secure Yourself an Entry into the Market
New to the market is this neat and tidy solid gem located only a few minutes from the waters edge of Corio Bay in the ever-growing town of Leopold. It is an ideal entry into the property game, first-home for a family or couple or perfect downsizer - do not miss out!
The comfortable floor plan comprises of three good size bedrooms, one with built-in robes and master with a walk-in and en-suite. Front two showcase white shutters on the windows for extra block-out and allow for undisturbed snoozing.
At the heart of the home is a central open-plan living area that is spacious and flooded with natural light. Step outside to a casual, outdoor entertaining zone where the foundations are in place.
The well-established lawn fills a generous backyard and provides an opportunity for new owners to make their mark with a landscaped garden or drop in a pool in time for summertime fun. This much yard is rare and my favourite bit about the property, says the current owner.
Embracing the modern touches with neutral tones throughout and a galley-style kitchen that boasts stainless steel appliances, dual sink, stone bench top, breakfast bar and ample cabinetry. Other features of the house include a double LUG with a rear roller door for drive-thru access, split system, wall heater, 2030lt water tank, wide entrance, soaker tub in the main bathroom, secure yard, double-glazed windows and solar-heated hot water systems.
With the road into Geelong, Melbourne and the rest of the Bellarine nearby, you will be spoilt for choice. Gateway Plaza shopping centre, local schools, kindergartens, sporting facilities and public transport are all within close reach. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
A Place In The Sun Between Coast & Country
Offers Closing Monday 2nd December at 4pm (Unless Sold Prior)
The Feel:
Hidden away at the end of a country driveway lies a picture-perfect rural lifestyle opportunity on 3.7 (approx.) stunning acres. This 3 BR contemporary home with high raked ceilings is awash with light, offering verdant outlooks from every window to lawns & lovingly tended gardens. Dual living spaces & a well-equipped galley style kitchen provide breadth for individual or communal activities, with lots of sunny spots to sit & enjoy the peace & quiet of country life, only minutes to the surf beaches, local wineries and Geelong CBD.
The Facts:
-Classic, contemporary 3BR + study nook home on 3.7 (approx.) picturesque acres
-Driveway leads to home, set back from the road, with 100% privacy of extensive Conifer planting
-Rural lifestyle opportunity in tightly held Curlewis Rd, Wallington
-Living zones maximise the sunny North & West aspects, with a private, protected paved courtyard offering the ultimate entertainer’s suntrap
-Big galley kitchen positioned in the heart of the home, under soaring ceilings w/ long benchtop
-Miele double electric wall ovens, induction cooktop, dishwasher & large Euro-style bi-fold pantry
-2nd living offers formal lounge & dining room with triple aspect windows, large hearth & open fire
-Convenient study nook & large powder room adjacent to main living
-Carpeted bedrooms all have fully fitted BIRs & enjoy garden views
-Master bedroom with romantic Wisteria pergola outlook, e- suite with large shower & toilet
-Hallway leads to separate BR wing with bathroom, separate toilet & linen press
-German engineered floating floorboards with Tassie Oak veneer
-Roman blinds & sash windows offering cross-flow ventilation throughout the home
-Seasonal comfort with open fireplace, gas heater, SSAC as well as ceiling fans
-Distinctive trees include Conifer boundaries, Japanese Maple, Oak, Port Wine Magnolias, Gum Trees, Forest Pansy; many plants raised from seedlings in greenhouse
-Pergola with Weeping Cherries, Wisteria, roses & beautifully maintained garden beds
-Abundant birdlife attracted to bird baths in this light-filled, beautiful garden with a fish pond
-Vegie patch, citrus & fruit trees + ample opportunities to establish more self-sufficient lifestyle
-DLUG with solid concrete flooring & internal door access to large laundry & storage cupboards
-Additional 10x7m (approx.) garage/workshop & sundry shedding
-Rainwater tank for garden & drinking, plus town water supply
-Only 5mins to Gateway Plaza SC, less than 10mins to Ocean Grove shops, cafes & beach
The Owner Loves….
“We hope the new owners will call this place home for generations to come. It is light-filled, quiet, and ever so tranquil with gardens and birdlife that have brought us so much joy over the years.”

Description:
Impeccable and Perfectly Positioned
This renovated family sized home is all about quality, space and making the most of life. Updated with a contemporary feel and boasting totally remodeled bathrooms and kitchen, it is impeccably presented and ready to move straight in and enjoy.
With three separate living zones, four bedrooms plus a study, the floor plan is generous and well thought out. The extensive kitchen, in the open plan living and dining area, provides an attractive focal point. It is perfect for every day living and for entertaining the crowds. When its time to unwind, choose from the cosy sitting room complete with gas log fire, or close the doors on the rest of the world and spend quiet time in the family room.
Other highlights include a king sized master suite with a walk in robe and en-suite with double vanity. The three additional bedrooms are spacious and all have built in storage.
The 1050sqm (approx) grounds feel expansive and private with plenty of room for games on the lawn; or to sit back, relax and enjoy the easy care established gardens. Outdoor entertaining does not get any better than this with a large undercover deck fitted with custom made blinds to keep things shaded and sheltered.
Ducting heating and vacuuming, ceiling fans, skylights, generous storage, double lock up garage and a garden shed add touches of practical comfort.
Situated in a quiet and friendly court, this property is ideally positioned for easy access to shops, beaches and the best of the Bellarine. Homes of this calibre are highly sought after and very rarely available.

Description:
Roll up the sleeves time to get dirty & do some work!
Tucked away at the end of Courier Court is this hidden family home full of surprises. This brick veneer home is situated on a large 851m2 block approx.
Step inside the property to find a deceptively large and fully functional floorplan. Complete with 4 generous bedrooms, all comprising of built in robes, including the master with a fully equipped en-suite. Complimenting the additional central bathroom, offering twin vanity closed off from separate toilet and separate shower and bath. There are 2 living zones, with feature brick open fireplace, also a dining and kitchen area, offering ample cupboard and bench space, including dishwasher and updated gas appliances. There is a very practical second option in the 8.5m x 6.5m double garage, including double sink, cupboards and pantry space, it also offers separate toilet, T.V. and heating, making it a perfect space for entertaining all year round.
Step outside through the back door to a large salt/chlorinated pool, fully gated in and solar heated. Other features include gas wall furnace, 2 split system and a separate 1 ½ car remote garage for a boat/caravan/jet ski storage.
Desirably positioned, being close enough to all the modern conveniences of life. Situated in a welcoming court, just a few steps from a playground/park area, with a school, Sportsman Club, parks and Bellarine Rail Trail within walking distance. CBD, Ocean Grove Beaches and Bellarine wineries at your fingertips, this has a lot to offer buyers and investors. Dont miss out!

Description:
Tranquil Gem, Extremely Rare on over an Acre! Fall in Love!
Fall in love with this stunning, well maintained and ideally presented four bedroom family home, situated on over 4046 square meters.
Neatly tucked away in a quiet yet central location, you can enjoy the tranquility of a country lifestyle, with the convenience of having shops and all amenities close by with only 2 sets of traffic lights into Geelong.
When you arrive at the property you get a real sense of privacy and space, the home is set far off the road up a winding driveway. It doesn't end there, this home just keeps on giving.
Step inside to the semi open plan kitchen/dining and open plan living. Which is the real hub of the home, the lounge room comes equipped with stunning open fireplace and evaporative cooling through the home. The kitchen offers a gas cooktop, electric wall oven and dishwasher, plenty of cupboard space and plentiful benchtops. This overlooks the dining and family room and sliding doors out to the alfresco area, perfect for entertaining and relaxing.
With privacy from the other bedrooms, the Master bedroom is equipped with S/S, ensuite and WIR positioned at the front of the home. The remaining 3 bedrooms are in a separate wing of the home all with BIR's and serviced with a central bathroom, separate WC and laundry with access externally.
Externally where do we start? You will be amazed by the botanical style gardens, boasting a SLUG garage, with vehicle access through to the expansive backyard on both sides of the home, a workshop, garden shed and an outdoor bungalow which can be utilized as an artroom, a man cave, teenage retreat or office which is ideal for a tradie or small business owner. For the entertainer there is a big undercover alfresco area with BBQ, a separate undercover decked dining area with feature lights set under stunning established palm trees - you won't want to leave.
The property is surrounded by established trees and provides a private and secure rear yard, with room to hit a golf ball and practice your Teeing off. The property is a Must See! Words can not describe the beauty of this tucked away retreat. It truly is one of a kind. Inspection is a Must.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Location second to none.
Positioned between all of Leopold's essential amenities this property offers an affordable and practical opportunity to invest with confidence or downsize with minimal compromise. With Leopold Primary School, the new Community Hub and Medical Clinic meters away, the addition of local shopping within a short walks distance at Dorothy Street or the quick trip to Gateway Plaza will only be rivalled by the convenient access to the Bus Stop virtually at your doorstep.
Situated on approximately 205sqm, the home itself features a large open plan living space adjoined to the kitchen with great bench space. Serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet, the two bedrooms are spacious and feature built in robes. Outside, the alfresco area provides ample undercover space for summer barbeques and plenty of room for keen gardeners. Extra features include lock up single garage and split system.
Currently tenanted at $270 per week.

Address: 5 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Ideal entertainer or family home
Located in sought after Clifton Springs just a leisurely stroll to the waters edge, this immaculate 4-bedroom home is all a family or entertainer could hope for. With a fresh make over and all the work done for you, this home is ready for you to move in and begin your ideal coastal lifestyle.
In an elevated position with views to the You Yangs, the manicured gardens and large double doors welcome you in to the central hall way. To the left, a well-designed lounge and dining area filled with natural light welcomes you. Snuggle up in front of the open fire or create an impressive dinner party for your friends. To the right the master suite with large windows and great proportions is finished with a spacious walk in robe and modern en suite.
Down the hallway, the contemporary kitchen and living space are the heart of the home. Prepare meals for the family or talk to your guests in the open plan space. Utilise all the modern conveniences, ample bench space, dishwasher and storage space found in the kitchen. A covered al fresco area off the living room is ideal for gatherings or casual barbeques. Open the large sliding doors to enjoy the stunning greenery and newly established gardens which create a lush tropical oasis in your own back yard.
To the rear of the home, three further bedrooms are generous in size with built-in robes and ceiling fans. Servicing these bedrooms is an additional family size bathroom that includes a large walk in shower and bath, and a separate toilet. Split system cooling and gas central heating ensure your comfort all year round. An additional large garden to the rear and other side of the house allow plenty of room for play and the double garage has drive through boat or caravan storage at the rear.
This property is central to all attractions and amenities the Bellarine has to offer and is a home for all seasons and occasions. First impressions count & this beautiful family home will not disappoint.

Description:
Townhouse Living With Uninterrupted Views!
Upgrade your lifestyle in a heartbeat with this two-bedroom townhouse! Boasting street frontage and elevated views that capture the sparkling bay waters and You Yangs, this home is an absolute treat!
Public transport and the Carmichael Reserve playground are footsteps away. The Ash Road shops are also within walking distance, meaning you can enjoy a coffee or grab a bite to eat whenever you please. Both Lake Connewarre and the Gateway Sanctuary entice you to connect back to nature. Easy access to Leopold Kindergarten, Leopold Primary School, and the Leopold Community Hub is ideal for those with young children. To top it all off, a short drive will find you at the Gateway Plaza where youll be spoilt for choice with eateries and big brand stores.
Inside, floating floorboards and white walls grace the interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone welcomes you into the home and is bathed in an abundance of natural light. With large windows and the front balcony capturing the west and north-facing views, youll love that this uninterrupted outlook is yours to keep.
The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, dishwasher, oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
Both bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the bathroom is complete with a shower, bathtub, and single vanity. The separate toilet and laundry with storage and external access add the final touches to the floorplan.
A gas wall heater and air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons, while an alarm system provides peace of mind. Awnings on the front windows offer additional comfort during the warmer months.
Easy care gardens leave you free to enjoy the more important things in life, while the sunny alfresco deck inspires casual outdoor living. The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
Whether youre a first homebuyer, downsizer, investor, or simply dreaming of a carefree lifestyle, this home is the one for you! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Bountiful Beauty on Birchbank
More than just a home, this property provides the perfect focal point to living, entertaining and for simply enjoying the good life. Expertly crafted by renowned Wookey Builders and featuring their trademark colonial detailing, the extensive home and grounds are brimming with functional features with an added touch of class and elegance.
Lovingly cared for by the same family since new, the brick veneer home has a family-centric heart. Its large open plan living, dining, kitchen and games area is the main hub. Kept cosy in winter by the wood fire and perfect for entertaining all year around with great connection to undercover outdoor dining and north facing gardens. The adjacent formal lounge is the perfect spot to relax and unwind.
The spacious master suite includes an en-suite and large walk in robe. There are a further four bedrooms (all with walk in robes), plus study and sewing room. Offering plentiful space for the whole family and extras. For all year round comfort there is ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling.
For the practically minded there are two separate workshop spaces, one in the double internal access garage, the other in the implement shed. There is also secure parking and storage for multiple vehicles including room for the caravan or boat. Further highlights include 2.8kw solar power; fully automated garden sprinkler system; generous rain water storage; chicken run; enclosed vegetable gardens; and plentiful off street parking. The 3,058m²(approx) sunny landscaped grounds are picturesque and tranquil.
Just moments from the Rail Trail and on the doorstep of all that is good about the Bellarine, you will love this location and the chance to secure a very special slice of paradise.

Description:
Peaceful Court Living
Nestled in picturesque gardens in a quiet court, this brick and tile home will appeal to anyone who enjoys peaceful living. Featuring a floor plan that makes the most of the 720m² (approx) north-facing site, this home has interesting angles and an abundance of natural light. The polished solid timber floors in the spacious lounge and dining area are a highlight as are the soaring ceilings and exposed brick feature walls. Step up into the second living zone where the sleek refurbished kitchen will impress with its plentiful storage and quality Bosch appliances. Easy access to the sunny courtyard makes this home an obvious choice for effortless entertaining. With four spacious bedrooms in total, including a generous master with en-suite and walk in robe, there is plenty of room for family and guests. Practical highlights include a renovated laundry and great storage throughout.
With ample off street parking, the large carport is currently used as a private and shady alfresco, providing the perfect outdoor living space on summer days. The hobbyist or craftsperson will love the workshop area in the nearly new freestanding garage. Extra storage is available in the garden shed and a rainwater tank is an added bonus too.
Enjoy sand and sea breezes with safe swimming beaches nearby, or venture just a little further to experience world-class surfing and stunning coastal scenery. With the convenience of Drysdale on the doorstep and Geelong a short commute away, this property is not only packed full of practical benefits but it feels and looks great too.

Description:
Classy Modern Living
Nestled within the family friendly Estuary Estate, this property will exceed your expectations. Whether you are looking to break into the market with your first home, invest or wishing to downsize, this neat property is worth your attention. Located just a short stroll from local parks, sporting grounds and the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza, this property offers so much more than just an idea location.
This beautiful family home comprises four generous sized bedrooms, main complete with walk in robe and private ensuite, while remaining bedrooms utilize the stylish central bathroom and separate toilet. The spacious and light filled open plan living, kitchen and dining area, all overlook the superbly decked entertaining area. The fully equipped kitchen has it all. Complete with a stainless-steel 900mm free standing, dishwasher, built-in pantry and an abundance of bench space offering a large island breakfast bar. Offering an additional separate living area located at the front of the home, perfect for the growing family.
Just a step out through the glass sliders and you are standing on the fantastic decked entertaining area, equipped with café blinds making it perfect for enjoying all year round- while overlooking the low maintenance and private yard.
Added extras include double lock up garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system cooling and landscaped gardens.
With the ever-expanding Gateway Shopping Centre just minutes away, within easy access to the Geelong CBD and the many amenities of the Bellarine Peninsula, this property is one not to be missed. This home is immaculate throughout out and leaves nothing left to do. A perfect opportunity in a desirable location, dont miss out on this one!

Description:
SPACIOUS CHARACTER HOME WITH VIEWS, QUIET LOCATION
Located in a quiet cul de sac this solid, established home was built to stand the test of time. With beautiful views across the roof tops to Corio Bay and Geelong from the downstairs living areas and sweeping vistas from the master bedroom and balcony upstairs. The open plan family living area has lofty ceilings and plenty of light filtering through large windows.
Solid timber kitchen cabinetry has been maintained in excellent condition. The second and third bedrooms provide plenty of BIR space and are serviced by the family bathroom. Bed 2 accesses the outdoor patio area.
Upstairs the open gallery takes in the central hub of the home with multiple nooks for quiet sitting areas. A cosy study is located in the loft area over the single garage. The master suite with balcony has stunning secure views to Geelong, Corio Bay and Baie Winery. Ensuite, separate toilet and walk through robe adjoin the master suite.
Side access to the rear yard and shedding is a bonus for the avid fisherman or traveler.
Shed approx 8m x 5m with toilet, sink and plenty of shelving. The lovely rear garden is low maintenance.

Description:
Great Home in Established Court
Here is a home that would be ideal for the family or retiree. Only nineteen years young and well maintained, rooms are spacious and zoned. Located close to the local primary school and neighborhood shopping strip. Public transport is also available. Less than five minutes from the Clifton Springs Boat ramp and Curlewis Shopping Centre.
The main bedroom with ensuite has adjacent study or nursery. Living - dining areas are well spaced for entertaining the whole family with a cosy wood heater or gas central heating. The dining area is surrounded by a pleasant outlook to the garden. Adjoining the indoor living is a fantastic outdoor entertaining area with character combustion heater and games area.
Two minor bedrooms with BIRs share the family bathroom. There is ample storage and a great laundry.
The rear yard is a good size on this 716m2 block. Plenty of room for the keen gardener.
Extras are 6mx3m garden shed and 5 KW solar panels.

Description:
Perfect Downsizer or Investment!!
Idyllic living with a warm sense of community makes this the perfect abode for the downsizer, first home buyer or investor.
This low maintenance home comprises of a master bedroom complete with ensuite and WIR alongside two further sizeable bedrooms with BIR's which are serviced by a second central bathroom. The spacious kitchen provides ample storage and bench space expanding into the living and dining area.
Soak up the sun and enjoy your morning coffee in the peaceful and secluded undercover alfresco area with beautifully landscaped surroundings. This home is built for comfort all year round with reverse cycle cooling and gas space heater. Single lock up garage with additional off-street parking provides roller door access to the rear yard and alfresco area, ideal for the caravan or boat.
Living is made easy in this home with the location being Key. Leave the car at home and enjoy the short stroll to Gateway plaza shopping precinct, sporting facilities or a serene walk along the Bellarine rail trail. Geelong's CBD is just a short trip away as are the many attractions the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. Don't miss out on this perfect opportunity.

Description:
The Perfect Investment Opportunity!
Sitting proudly upon its own title, this home offers the perfect blend of low-maintenance and convenient living! With an excellent tenant in place until the 20th of December and hoping to stay long-term, astute investors will need to act swiftly to secure this perfect package!
Ideally positioned within easy reach of all of Leopolds amenities, this location will leave you wanting nothing. The Leopold Sportsmans Club is a short stroll away for a great meal, while the Bellarine Rail Trail inspires outdoor adventures. Convenience is key with Kensington Road also home to a Medical Centre, the Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and Leopold Library. The shops and cafes of the Gateway Plaza are wonderfully close by, along with the Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds. And to top it all off, a short drive will find you in the heart of Geelong or exploring the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
The open plan living/dining zone welcomes you into the home and creates a wealth of space for when family and friends come to visit. A sliding door opens onto the north-facing yard, which creates a lovely spot to relax and soak up the sunshine. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry, oven, gas hob, rangehood, and dishwasher. The breakfast bar is ideal for casual dining.
Two bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the tidy bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with storage and external access. You'll be comfortable all year long thanks to a split-system air conditioner.
The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking, while easy care gardens are a blessing.
When it comes to easy and convenient living, this home packs a punch! Inspect ASAP!
